point.label: Module Index
point.description: Index of the module within the string.

point.label: Module Cell Count
point.description: Count of all cells in the module.

point.label: Max Cell Voltage
point.description: Maximum voltage for all cells in the module.

point.label: Min Cell Voltage
point.description: Minimum voltage for all cells in the module.

point.label: Max/Min Cell Voltage Loc
point.description: Location of maximum and minimum cell voltages.
point.notes: Bit0:Bit7 = Maximum cell number. Bit8:Bit15 = Minimum cell number.

point.label: Max Cell Temp
point.description: Maximum temperature for all cells in the module.

point.label: Min Cell Temp
point.description: Minimum temperature for all cells in the module.

point.label: Max/Min Cell Temp Loc
point.description: Location of maximum and minimum cell temperatures.
point.notes: Bit0:Bit7 = Index of maximum temperature reading. Bit 8:Bit15: Index of minimum temperature reading.

point.label: Max Cell SOC
point.description: Maximum state of charge for all cells in the module.

point.label: Max Cell SOC
point.description: Minimum state of charge for all cells in the module.

point.label: Max/Min Cell SOC Loc
point.description: Location of cells with minimum and maximum state of charge.
point.notes: Bit0:Bit7 = Maximum cell number. Bit8:Bit15 = Minimum cell number.

point.label: Max Cell SOH
point.description: Maximum state of health for all cells in the module.

point.label: Max Cell SOH
point.description: Minimum state of health for all cells in the module.

point.label: Max/Min Cell SOH Loc
point.description: Location of cells with minimum and maximum state of charge.
point.notes: Bit0:Bit7 = Maximum cell number. Bit8:Bit15 = Minimum cell number.

point.label: Serial Number
point.description: Serial number for the module.

point.label: Balanced Cell Count
point.description: Count of balanced cells in the module.

point.label: Cycle Count
point.description: Count of cycles executed.
Scale factor for cell voltage.
Scale factor for module temperature.
Scale factor for cell state of charge.
Scale factor for cell state of health.

point.label: Cell Voltage
point.description: Cell terminal voltage.

point.label: Cell SOC
point.description: Cell state of charge, expressed as a percentage.

point.label: Cell SOH
point.description: Cell state of health, expressed as a percentage.

point.label: Cell Temperature
point.description: Cell temperature.
